name: Neverwinter Nights 2: Storm of Zehir
description:
Neverwinter Nights 2: Storm of Zehir is a RPG game developed by Obsidian Entertainment. It was originally released in 2008. It was published by Atari. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Neverwinter Nights 2: Storm of Zehir on PC.
Kevin Saunders produced the game. It was scored by Alexander Brandon.
